mapper.select: SELECT no, name, prior_no priorNo FROM regions WHERE prior_no is null

SELECT r.name, COUNT(p.no) num FROM products p INNER JOIN delivery_regions dr ON dr.product_no = p.no INNER JOIN regions r ON dr.area_no = r.no INNER JOIN categories c ON c.no = p.category_no WHERE (r.no = #{tempNo} OR r.prior_no = #{tempNo} ) AND (c.no = #{categoryNo} OR c.prior_no = #{categoryNo}) GROUP BY r.name

SELECT r.name, (SELECT SUM(count(p.no)) FROM products p INNER JOIN delivery_regions dr ON dr.product_no = p.no INNER JOIN regions r ON dr.area_no = r.no INNER JOIN categories c ON c.no = p.category_no WHERE (r.no = #{tempNo} OR r.prior_no =#{tempNo} ) AND (c.no = #{categoryNo} OR c.prior_no = #{categoryNo}) GROUP BY r.name) num FROM regions r WHERE r.no = #{tempNo}
